<#EFD09F>การดูแลสุขภาพ</color>

<#EFD09F>Monumental</color>: When performing a Side attack on the enemy, your own Combo increases by <#29F161>{寒铁拳套1多效果1%}</color>.
When attacking, inflict <#FE2929>{倚天剑1多效果1} points of Blinded</color> on the enemy.
When attacking the enemy, you gain an additional <#29F161>{干将1多效果1} points of Spirit</color>.
When attacking, inflict <#FE2929>{干将2多效果1} points of Bleeding</color> on the enemy.
When performing a Side attack on the enemy, your own Combo increases by <#29F161>{轩辕1多效果1%}</color>.
When performing a Side attack on the enemy, there is a {轩辕2多效果1%} chance to trigger the <#FE2929>Cut tendon</color> effect on them【<#F3DE99>Cut tendon: Movement Range reduced by 3 squares</color>】.
When attacking the enemy, you gain an additional <#29F161>{太乙刀1多效果1} points of Spirit</color>.
